full_sentence: Chinese culture is great. Their picture language. Chinese arts, philosophy and war. Everything about them is fantastic. I just love Chinese more when they live in their country of origin so I don't have to see it.

Disney animated children's program to showcase first bisexual lead character. I watched the first season and I had this weird feeling the whole time that it would turn political at any moment and I was right. Now I know why. I did enjoy the series and am glad that there was no romance or reference to sexuality. As long as it stays that way, it doesn't matter what sexual orientation the creator claims their character to be.
